title: Here's a rhythm game powered entirely by chill vibes
description: Melatonin is a rhythm game without the interfaces or overlays that otherwise define the genre.

title: Just how bad was the Aerosmith videogame, Revolution X?
description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

title: Riot is suing NetEase over an alleged Valorant clone
description: Riot alleges that mobile shooter Hyper Front copies substantial portions of Valorant.

title: An upcoming RTS will incorporate the rollback tech that took Fighting games by storm
description: Stormgate, from a team of ex-Blizzard developers, was revealed earlier this year.

title: $4.8 million paid to ZA/UM and one lawsuit dropped as the battle over Disco Elysium continues
description: Both the current CEO of ZA/UM and the Disco Elysium producer who sued him claim victory over the lawsuit, while the game's ousted creative leads still weigh legal options.

title: Today's Wordle answer and hint for Saturday, December 10
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #539 puzzle.
